name: Weighted Shadow
description: • Experience the life of a person barely holding onto their sense of control, as life continually tries to rip it away. In this gripping story, you truly are your own worst enemy, as depression and anxiety are harsh truths that many people grapple with every day. This game seeks to shine a light on one such individual, where every day is an internal battle: You. Your innermost thoughts turn against you, berate, and seek to tear you down at every turn, as you simply try and live your life the best that you can. The sheer weight of such a life will feel overbearing as you desperately try and keep your head above water.
